participant_abstract.sent: We dicussed the various aspects of the project including the way the system works, functions on the remote and also the visual design and the market we are aiming for.
Ie. what people want, what we are planning to give them and how it will work.
Most important to myself as the industrial designer was what functions we are going to have in the remote as I have to design the system that will incorporate them.

participant_actions.sent: Myself- industrial designer - working out how the remote will work with the functions selected.
User-interface designer - working more on the design of the product.
Marketing - finding prices(?) - more info on the market.

participant_decisions.sent: To try and reach the broadest possible market.
To look into the possibility of having a voice recognition or 'clapper' system for people to find lost remotes with.
To make the product as simple as possible to use.
To have two seperate groups of buttons - basic channel and volume buttons on the front and tuning, visual adjustment and other required but often less used buttons hidden away.

participant_problems.sent: Agreeing on whether to use a voice recognition system or not.
Agreeing on exactly which buttons to incorporate.
Not knowing at this point exactly what will be possible give the time and financial restrictions (lack of info).
Maybe a lack of organisation as to what is expected of each of us before the next meeting.
